description: heavy; ring foot; plate shape; brown and grey on bottom; rim band has grey glaze with zigzag texturing and three cartouches with green, yellow and red organic abstracted designs; center ring with lines of blue inlaid clay and three cartouches similar to outer band; central circle with purple-brown iridescent dots
markings: on bottom, impressed: unidentified mark; on bottom, on sticker: [77]
medium: Mashiko ware; glazed stoneware with inlaid slip decor
title: Plate with inlaid akae flower pattern
